Uses of Class
org.apache.sis.measure.NumberRange

Packages that use NumberRange
Package
Description
org.apache.sis.coverage
Functions that associates positions within a bounded space (its domain) to values (its range).
org.apache.sis.image
Provides helper classes for handling Java2D rendered images together with some operations.
org.apache.sis.math
A set of mathematical objects and algebraic utilities.
org.apache.sis.measure
Units of measurements, values related to measurement (like angles and ranges) and their formatters.
org.apache.sis.referencing.operation.builder
Helper classes for creating Math Transforms from a set of points.
